thread.section_title: Airtasker Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airtasker | www.airtasker.com
thread.title: Baby63

author: Baby63
title: Baby63
text:
Very easy to use this app. Brilliant idea to find skilled people to outsource work to with no hassles.After selecting a skilled tradesman to assemble my furniture I am impressed with the efficiency and friendliness of the person I selected.
Mark D was able to complete my task within 3 hrs of my requesting him . This would've taken me a whole day even worh help.
I am very happy with the quality of his work. Now I am confident to use other tradespeople from this site.
Thank you Airtasker.
